@graph.name: Clustering 3k PBMC with Scanpy
@graph.description:
Workflow based on clustering 3K PBMCs with Scanpy tutorial

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Clustering 3K PBMCs with Scanpy](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/single-cell/tutorials/scrna-scanpy-pbmc3k/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)

## Features

* Includes [Galaxy Workflow Tests](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/faqs/gtn/workflow_run_test.html)
* Includes a [Galaxy Workflow Report](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/faqs/galaxy/workflows_report_view.html)
